thread.title: The 10 Best Airbnb Pools From Around The World
thread.title_full: The 10 Best Airbnb Pools From Around The World

author: Michelle Persad
title: The 10 Best Airbnb Pools From Around The World
text:
The 10 Best Airbnb Pools From Around The World We can't wait to dive in. Michelle Persad Fashion Editor, The Huffington Post Posted: 09/01/2015 07:00 AM EDT AIRBNB.COM 
We don't know about you, but we love pools. Especially pools that we could theoretically swim in one day. And what better place to search pool porn than on Airbnb ? 
So, to further fuel our addiction, we trolled the rental site to find the best pools from around the world. From an infinity pool in Costa Rica to a pool in Thailand that you can actually eat in, we're already dreaming of our next vacation. 
1. Unique Modern Family Home AIRBNB.COM 
Location: Balgowlah, New South Wales, Australia 
Rate: $591/night
